name: University of Hawaii alumni revolving fund
text: There is established the University of Hawaii alumni revolving fund into which shall be deposited funds and proceeds received by the university from alumni activities and donations from alumni.  Funds deposited into this revolving fund may be expended by the university for all costs associated with conducting alumni affairs, activities, and programs for the university system, including but not limited to expenses for honoraria, hotel and room rentals, food and refreshment, printing and mailing, banners and signs, plaques and awards, airfare and per diem, leis, rental of audiovisual, musical, and stage equipment, and activity supplies and materials, without regard to statutory competitive bidding requirements. [L 2006, c 75, pt of §2]
